title: Completed PE Summary - Hohebank
raw_html:
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: Intrada Ships Management Ltd
Port of registry: Rochester
Flag: UK
Type: General Cargo
Built: 1977
Classification society: Germanischer Lloyd
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 79.71
Gross tonnage: 1687.00
Date & Time 28/09/05 03:30
Location of incident: Foreign water
Incident Type: Grounding
Persons onboard: 6 crew
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: Material Damge/No Pollution

Synopsis

General cargo vessel grounded in the approaches to Varberg, Sweden.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector wrote to the operators of Hohebank recommending they identify and establish controls to ensure that ship’s staff understand and adhere to company policies and procedures; particular focus to be placed on ensuring compliance with the company’s drug and alcohol policy and requirements with respect to bridge watchkeeping at sea.
